channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive: W.H. cites George Washington for Trump paying troops without Congress
item.description: Rebutting shutdown critics, President Trump's budget office sent Congress a memo Friday arguing that history shows he has the right to move money arou...

item.title: Trump releases Former Rep. George Santos from prison
item.description: President Trump said Friday he signed a commutation to immediately release former Rep. George Santos (R-N.Y.) from prison. Why it matters: Santos was ...

item.title: U.S. military detains survivors of latest boat strike near Venezuela
item.description: The operation is the sixth known attack on alleged drug smugglers in the Caribbean, and the first known to have left some people alive.

item.title: Maine Senate candidate downplayed sexual assault concerns in deleted posts
item.description: Democrat Graham Platner disavowed the comments in an interview with The Washington Post, saying, “I don’t want people to judge me off the dumbest thin...

item.title: House releases new Epstein investigation documents, Alex Acosta interview
item.description: The documents include schedules of meetings with powerful figures, call logs, and Acosta speaking about Epstein’s plea deal.

item.title: Trump orders disgraced former congressman George Santos released from prison
item.description: Santos had been sentenced to more than seven years in prison after pleading guilty to federal charges of aggravated identity theft and wire fraud

item.title: Trump admin cancels more than $11 billion in mostly blue state projects
item.description: The Trump administration is pausing more than $11 billion in projects to mostly Democratic-led cities, the Office of Management and Budget director an...

item.title: Trump rejects Zelensky on Tomahawk missiles in "tough" meeting
item.description: President Trump told Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky in a tense meeting on Friday that he doesn't intend to provide long-range Tomahawk missile...

item.title: Trump urges Supreme Court to allow National Guard in Chicago
item.description: President Trump filed an emergency appeal Friday, asking the Supreme Court to approve the deployment of the National Guard to Chicago amid his immigra...

item.title: New York GOP suspends Young Republicans chapter after racist chat messages
item.description: The move leaves the door open for the return at an undetermined time of a political organization aimed at party members ages 18 to 40.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
